description: This file defines a React functional component called Navbar that renders a top navigation bar with branding, theme toggle button, and authentication actions (sign in/sign out). It imports React, routing utilities, and authentication context, and manages navigation and user logout actions.

methods.name: Navbar
methods.description: React functional component that renders a top navigation bar with theme toggle and auth actions.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling logout() and navigating to the home page.
